DOC.brief_summary: This study determine effect nutrition supplementation blood protein level pediatric burn patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Nutritional Supplementation Pediatric Burn Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . 110 year age 2 . Hospital admission within 24 hour postburn 3 . At least 15 % TBSA burn least 2nd degree 5 % TBSA 4th degree high 4 . Capable exclusive oral feeding within 3 day hospitalization 5 . Expected hospitalize least 14 day 1 . History diabetes stressinduced hyperglycemia 2 . Artificial ventilation 3 . Requires parenteral enteral feed 4 . IV albumin 5 . Drug affect metabolism 6 . Receiving Dialysis 7 . Acutely impacted constipate 8 . Consumes nonstudy nutritional supplement 9 . Allergy intolerance study product ingredient 10 . Participating nonAbbott approve concomitant trial
